0.name: The Landing
desc: "  You are on a weather-beaten dock.  It appears ready to collapse.
Evidently nobody has been around to take care of things.

1.name: An Old Path
1.desc: "  You are on a north-south path.

2.name: An Old Path
2.desc: "  You are on a north-south path.

3.name: An Old Path
3.desc: "  You are on a north-south path in a very desolate area.

4.name: An Old Path
4.desc: "  You are on a north-south path in an extremely barren part of the world.

5.name: The Wasteland
desc: "  You are on a dry, barren wasteland.  There is little evidence of life
here.  The ground is littered with bones, sticks, rocks, and other debris.
Further north of here it looks even worse.  There is a SIGN here.
The sign says:
BEWARE.  The Wasteland is a Dangerous Area.  It is controlled
by gangs of marauders and packs of hyenas.  Enter at your own
risk.  Nearly everything here is aggressive.  There is more
here than meets the eye.

10.name: The Wasteland
10.desc: "  You are in a bleak, desolate wasteland.

11.name: The Wasteland
11.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

12.name: The Wasteland
12.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

13.name: The Wasteland
desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.  Barely covered by the dirt are
the outlines of an old well.

exits.desc: The cover is heavy, but can be moved.

14.name: The Wasteland
14.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

15.name: The Wasteland
15.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

16.name: The Wasteland
16.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

17.name: The Wasteland
17.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

18.name: The Wasteland
18.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

19.name: The Wasteland
19.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

20.name: The Wasteland
desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.  To the west, a stone structure
appears to be intact.

21.name: The Wasteland
21.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

22.name: The Wasteland
22.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

23.name: The Wasteland
23.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

24.name: The Wasteland
24.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

25.name: The Wasteland
25.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

26.name: The Wasteland
26.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

27.name: The Wasteland
27.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

28.name: The Wasteland
desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.  There is a building to the
north.  To each side of the door is a plain Doric column.  You might
want to think twice about entering.

29.name: The Wasteland
29.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

30.name: The Wasteland
30.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

31.name: The Wasteland
31.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

32.name: The Wasteland
32.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

33.name: The Wasteland
33.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

34.name: The Wasteland
34.desc: "  You are on a bleak, desolate wasteland.

35.name: A Cavern
desc: "  You are in an underground cavern that extends west from here.  There
is barely enough room to stand up straight.

36.name: A Cavern
36.desc: "  You are in an underground cavern.

37.name: A Cavern
37.desc: "  You are in an underground cavern.

38.name: A Cavern
38.desc: "  You are in an underground cavern.

39.name: A Cavern
39.desc: "  You are in an underground cavern.

40.name: A Stone Shelter
desc: "  You are inside a stone shelter.  It may not protect you against the
elements, but it should keep your enemies out.

41.name: On A Ledge In A Dry Well
desc: "  You are halfway down (or is it halfway up?) an old dry well.  The
ledge here is big enough to hold several people.  There are a few
greek letters carved in the stone.

extra.desc: You see: chi alpha delta epsilon sigma ..

42.name: At The Bottom
42.desc: "  You are at the bottom of an old dry well.

45.name: In the Main Hall
desc: "   You are in the main hall of a large building.  There is a stairway
leading down.  To the north you hear a dissonant screeching.   You feel a
chill.

46.name: The Tunnel
46.desc: "   You are at the northern extremity of a large north-south tunnel.

47.name: The Tunnel
desc: "   You are in an extremely large north-south tunnel.
There is a small opening to the east.

48.name: The Tunnel
48.desc: "   You are at the southern end of a huge north-south tunnel.

49.name: The Amphitheater
desc: "   You are in a large amphitheatre.  It might have been used for
performances of some kind, a long time ago.

50.name: Where the Gorgons Dwell
desc: "   You are in a large, cold, damp room.  This is the room where the
three Gorgons are usually found.

51.name: The Bath
desc: "   You are in the bath of Proserpina.  The floor and walls are made of
marble.

55.name: A Peculiar Chamber
desc: "   You are in a chamber that is lit by an amber light.  There is a cage
at the north end of the room.

56.name: The Cage
desc: "   You are in a very sturdy cage.  The cage was obviously built to
contain a powerful beast.

58.name: The Large Laboratory
desc: "   You're in a large laboratory.  The lab appears to have been the
workplace of a primitive practioner of the chemical arts.  You sense
that this place is a portal to other realms.  A strange looking
curtain is to the south.

exits.desc: You see a shimmering wall of energized particles.

59.name: Ante-chamber
desc: "   This is the waiting room that might have once been used by
Proserpina, queen of the underworld, wife of Hades.

60.name: The Parlor of Proserpina
desc: "   This room was the waiting room of mighty Proserpina, the wife of
Hades, and the Queen of the Underworld.

64.name: The End of Hallway
64.desc: "   You are at the western end of a large hallway.

65.name: A Small Chamber
65.desc: "   You are in a very small chamber.

exits.desc: There appears to be a moveable plate covering a hole in the ceiling.

70.name: The East Wing
70.desc: "   You are in the main corridor of the east wing.

71.name: The East Wing
71.desc: "   You are in the main corridor of the east wing.

72.name: The East Wing
72.desc: "   You are in the main corridor of the east wing.

73.name: The East Wing
73.desc: "   You are in the main corridor of the east wing.

75.name: Sanctuary of the Lesser Gods
desc: "   You are in the room used by the lesser gods of the underworld,
Aeacus, Radamanthus, and Minos.  You can almost hear them plotting
against Hades...

76.name: The Library
desc: "   You are in the library.  There are no books here.  Perhaps the Lesser Gods
who sit in judgement on poor souls are here?

80.name: On a Winding Stairway
80.desc: "   You are near the bottom of a long, winding stairway.

81.name: On a Winding Stairway
81.desc: "   You are very near the bottom of a long, winding stairway.

82.name: On a Winding Stairway
82.desc: "   You are near the bottom of a long, winding stairway.

83.name: On a Winding Stairway
desc: "   You are on a long, winding stairway.  The stairway gets narrower
as you approach the top.

84.name: On a Winding Stairway
84.desc: "   You are near the top of a long, narrowing, winding stairway.

85.name: On a Winding Stairway
85.desc: "   You are very near the top of a long, winding stairway.

86.name: On a Winding Stairway
desc: "   You are very very near the top of a long, winding stairway.  The
stairway is very narrow here.

87.name: On a Winding Stairway
87.desc: "   You are at the top of a long, winding stairway.  You see a door.

88.name: On the Ramparts
desc: "   You are out in the open, high above the surrounding wasteland, which
stretches for as for as the eye can see.  The wind is very strong up here.
Perhaps not all of the howling you hear is due to the wind?

89.name: The Throne
desc: "   You are at the massive throne of Hades.  You might not have much
time to read this.

90.name: An Underground Field
desc: "   You are in an expansive underground field.  There is a depression
running through the field that might once have been a river.

91.name: An Underground Field
desc: "   You are in an expansive underground field.  There is a depression
running through the field that might once have been a river.

92.name: An Underground Field
desc: "   You are in an expansive underground field.  There is a depression
running through the field that might once have been a river.

93.name: An Underground Field
desc: "   You are in an expansive underground field.  There is a depression
running through the field that might once have been a river.

exits.desc: You look into what seems to be a deep pit.

94.name: A Wider Passage
94.desc: "   You are in another one of those passages.

95.name: An Alcove
desc: "   You have stepped into a small alcove, west of the large north-south
tunnel.

96.name: The Pit
desc: "   You are in a deep dark pit.  This place seems to be inhabited by a
disgusting creature of some sort.
